The Nightmare on Dark Woods

A street with its darkest tale yet. Four curious kids: John, Tom, Axel, Buster see a dodgy man with his suspicious looking dog move into the house next door. When curiosity drives the kids into the house â€¦ everything changes. They encounter horrors they never imagined and are terrified in so many ways. So brace yourself for a haunting trip that will make you quiver in your covers.
